trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around October 3rd 2008
Summary: five "fireballs" hovering at different altitudes about 1 mile from freeway
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving to work at 5;45 riding on rt. 44 east towards plymouth, through a clearing of trees i witnessed 5 fireball like objects, that were far more luminous than any other plane or star i have seen before, suspended(not moving) at different altitudes all relatively close to one another. my view of these objects was cut off by more trees as i drove further after about 7-8 seconds. there are radio towers through out the area, however i am positive that none are in this location as i have driven this route to work for the past 2 years. These objects were NOT like anything i have seen in the sky before.
